article.title: Aegis Technologies Wins Modeling and Simulation Contract
article.author: George Seffers

tags.tag: Air Force Modeling and Simulation Training Toolkit

article.text: Aegis Technologies Group, Huntsville, Alabama, is being awarded approximately $55 million for the Air Force Modeling and Simulation Training Toolkit. Task orders will be placed to respond to command and control and training environment modification; third party enhancements and integration; and information systems security engineering to incorporate information assurance requirements; system test and evaluation support of the software deliverable; software maintenance; planning and repair of software defects such as deficiency reports; maintenance of the minimum hardware specification(s); development of cost-benefit analysis; and on-site technical support for rapidly fielded baselines at exercises and events. Electronic Systems Center, Hanscom Air Force Base, Massachusetts, is the contracting activity.
